name: market for natural gas service station | natural gas service station | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/334/documentation

This is a market activity. In the case of services or immobile infrastructures, markets are connecting suppliers and consumers at a global level. For specific connections at regional level, direct links between the local producing activities and the local consumers are preferred. Transport or losses are logically not relevant for this type of products.;This is the market for  'natural gas service station', in the Global geography.;This market contains no transport or losses, as they are irrelevant for the delivered product.;This is an immobile infrastructure, representing the construction of a natural gas service station. The infrastructure represents a service station with 310,000 m3 gas (236,000 kg) sold per year, with an assumed lifetime of 50 years. The process includes land use for a natural gas service station, construction materials for compressor and container and the decommission of concrete.

This activity starts with the built infrastructure ready to use.

This activity ends with the infrastructure made accessible to the users. Transport or losses are considered irrelevant for this product.
